title: Font combination with Antique Olive Compact
content:
Any recommendations for a body copy typeface to go with my display type of Antique Olive Compact? It's for a student project on a book on John Coltrane. The display type is never on the same page as the body copy but I tried Helvetica Neue and it's not working well.

Thanks for any help!
author: mfoste05

comments.content:
Helvetica Neue doesn't even work well with Helvetica Neue...

Try FF-Balance.

hhp

Maybe [Vendôme](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720165124/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/vendome/), also from Fonderie Olive? You could also have a look at the types of [Typofonderie](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720165124/http:/typofonderie.com/) and [Jean-Baptiste Levée](http://web.archive.org/www.jblt.co) / [Bureau des Affairs Typographiques](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720165124/http:/www.batfoundry.com/).
Fonts In Use have some examples of [Antique Olive in use](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720165124/http:/fontsinuse.com/typefaces/1140/antique-olive) alongside a text face.
